Articles.Content:
My name\'s [glow=blue,2,300]Yogui87[/glow], I\'m from France so forgive me my bad english. Feel free to send me MP to report my spelling mistakes.

I start playing KSP on the 0.14 version and I felt in love with the game immediatly. That remind me my 12 years old, when I used watching moon and planets with my telescope dreaming of space and rockets. I never go further than water rockets. Now I can experiment real rockets and kill thousands of kerbonauts.

I\'m beginning in KSP mods too, so you can find my mods in [glow=blue,2,300]Lionhead Aerospace[/glow] topic here. Tell me what do you think about it.

See you on the Mun...

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Ah, don\'t worry about your English, as long as we can read it and understand your methods of KILLING MORE KERBALNAUTS, it\'s fine 8)
